```py
>>> a = span["ascender"]
>>> d = span["descender"]
>>> r = pymupdf.Rect(span["bbox"])
>>> o = pymupdf.Point(span["origin"])  # its y-value is the baseline
>>> r.y1 = o.y - span["size"] * d / (a - d)
>>> r.y0 = r.y1 - span["size"]
>>> # r now is a rectangle of height 'fontsize' 
```
